summary: Luxury e-commerce website for Royal Furniture - a premium furniture brand in Guwahati with full shopping cart, wishlist, secure checkout with multiple payment options (UPI, cards, net banking, COD via Razorpay/Stripe), order tracking, and comprehensive admin panel for product and order management
architectural_notes: Tech stack: React/Next.js frontend with Tailwind CSS, Node.js + Express backend, MongoDB database
Payment gateway: Razorpay or Stripe integration with SSL security
Hosting: Vercel for frontend, Render/Railway for backend
SEO optimization and fast loading required for luxury brand perception
Email service integration needed for order confirmations
Google Maps API integration for showroom location display
known_issues: Home page design does not meet luxury aesthetic standards
Products not displaying correctly or missing from the site
imageRequirements:

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication system with registration and login functionality using Internet Identity integration
Create shopping cart system with add to cart, remove from cart, and update quantity functionality
Implement wishlist feature allowing users to save favorite products
Build secure checkout system with cart summary, coupon application, delivery address form, shipping calculation, and order summary
Integrate Stripe payment gateway supporting multiple payment methods with order confirmation and tracking functionality

Create product catalog system with categories (Sofa, Family Sofa, Office Chair, Tables, Beds, Dining Sets) including multiple images, descriptions, pricing, discount badges, stock availability, and customer reviews with ratings
Build Shop page with filtering by category, price range filtering, and sorting options (price low to high, newest, popular) in a product grid layout
Create Product Details page with image gallery, price display, description, Add to Cart and Buy Now buttons, and customer reviews section

Build Home page with hero banner featuring premium furniture imagery, featured products section, product categories display, 'Why Choose Us' section, customer testimonials, store timing information (Open Daily 9AM-8PM), embedded Google Map showing Royal View Building, Dr BK Kakati Rd, Ulubari, Guwahati, Assam 781007, and footer with Royal Furniture contact details (+91 9864074530) and Facebook link (https://www.facebook.com/royalfurnitureghy)

Develop comprehensive admin panel with secure authentication, product management (add/edit/delete products with images and details), category management, order management with status updates (Pending, Shipped, Delivered), customer details view, sales dashboard with analytics, coupon management system, and inventory management

Implement luxury premium UI design with elegant theme using beige and white colors with gold accents, smooth animations and hover effects on interactive elements, modern typography, and fully responsive layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports

Redesign Home page hero section to match luxury aesthetic with premium typography, elegant spacing, refined animations, and high-end furniture imagery

Upgrade categories section with sophisticated grid layout, premium imagery for each category, elegant hover effects with opacity transitions, and refined category labels with luxury typography
Refine testimonials section with elevated card designs, enhanced typography, elegant quotation marks styling, refined customer photos or initials displays, and sophisticated background treatment
